hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct doc.name from XWikiDocument doc where doc.space=:space order by doc.name asc
select distinct doc.name from XWikiDocument doc where doc.space=:space
select distinct doc.space from XWikiDocument doc order by doc.space asc
select distinct doc.fullName from XWikiDocument as doc
select distinct doc.fullName from XWikiDocument as doc

select distinct doc.fullName from XWikiDocument as doc, BaseObject as obj, StringProperty as prop where obj.name = doc.fullName and obj.className='XWiki.XWikiGroups' and obj.id = prop.id.id and prop.id.name='member' and (prop.value=:username or prop.value=:shortname or prop.value=:veryshortname)

select distinct doc.fullName from XWikiDocument as doc, BaseObject as obj, StringProperty as prop where obj.name = doc.fullName and obj.className='XWiki.XWikiGroups' and obj.id = prop.id.id and prop.id.name='member' and prop.value=:prefixedmembername
select distinct doc.fullName from XWikiDocument as doc, BaseObject as obj where obj.name=doc.fullName and obj.className='XWiki.XWikiUsers'
select doc.space, doc.name, doc.author from XWikiDocument doc, BaseObject obj where doc.fullName=obj.name and obj.className='XWiki.WikiMacroClass'
SELECT doc.fullName FROM XWikiDocument as doc, BaseObject as obj WHERE obj.name = doc.fullName AND obj.className = 'XWiki.WatchListJobClass'
